Banner.Description:
As a Software Engineer with over 4 years of experience, I specialize in developing distributed systems using C#, ASP.NET Core, Java, and Spring Boot.

My expertise extends to building robust RESTful APIs, leveraging cloud platforms like AWS, and utilizing DevOps tools such as Azure DevOps for streamlined software delivery pipelines.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: With over 4 years of experience as a Software Engineer, I have honed my expertise in developing distributed systems using C#, ASP.NET Core, Java, and Spring Boot. I have worked with on a diverse range of projects involving RESTful APIs, cloud platforms like AWS, DevOps tools such as Azure DevOps, and both SQL and NoSQL databases.
Additionally, I have gained valuable experience working with Natural Language Processing and Machine Learning during college years in Japan.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Intern Fullstack developer
Description: Collaborated with teams, including developers and product managers, to gather requirements and translate them into functional UI components.
Designed and implemented user-friendly and responsive UI components for multiple features, including location and languages, using Angular, TypeScript, and JavaScript.
Developed and maintained backend applications using ASP.NET Core and C# to support the frontend UI components.
Implemented RESTful APIs and services to facilitate data exchange between the frontend and backend systems.
Utilized Object-Relational Mapping (ORM) techniques and repositories to map input data to database (MS SQL) entities.
Followed industry-standard coding practices, including version control with Azure DevOps, code reviews, and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software Engineer (Full Stack - Java)
Description: Refactored monolithic applications (Java, C#, and ASP.NET Core) to distributed applications using Java and Spring Boot Framework.
Developed responsive front-end interfaces with Angular, TypeScript, CSS3, HTML5, and JavaScript.
Built and maintained RESTful APIs using Spring Boot and Spring MVC.
Designed and implemented secure DBMS using Spring Data JPA and Hibernate.
Utilized monitoring tools like Spring Boot Actuator and ELK Stack (Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana) for proactive issue identification.
Wrote comprehensive unit tests for APIs using JUnit and Mockito.
Created CI/CD pipelines with AWS EC2 and Azure DevOps.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software Engineer
Description: Designed, implemented, and tested new features to a position tracker web applications using C#, ASP.NET Core, Angular, and TypeScript.
Utilized ActiveMQ for messaging and asynchronous communication between the web application and other backend systems.
Maintained existing applications and helped diagnose problems in the development process.
Retrieved all the available locations of public facilities, convert to readable format and store in database using SQL and NoSQL databases.
Co-developed custom Java SE application services for users to view GPS information using C# and ASP.NET Core.
Co-developed and tested a Java-based custom map application utilizing GIS technologies.

OtherProjects.Title: My personal projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: LeetCode Problems
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A collection of solutions to various LeetCode problems, showcasing problem-solving skills and proficiency in algorithms and data structures.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Online Retail System
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A Java-based web application for an online retail system using the Spring Boot framework. It provides a seamless shopping experience with features like product management, order processing, and user account management.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Stockify
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A dynamic and engaging stock web application designed to provide real-time stock information and visualizations. This project demonstrates your ability to work with TypeScript and C#, and to create interactive web applications.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Data Input Services
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A microservice web application designed to handle data input services. This project utilizes a microservices architecture, incorporating technologies such as Kafka, Spring Framework, and Zuul API Gateway.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Segmentation CRF Khmer
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Word segmentation for Khmer documents using Conditional Random Fields (CRF). This project includes various implementations using CRF, Hidden Markov Models (HMM), and other sklearn algorithms to achieve high accuracy in word segmentation.

Education.Title: Education

Education.List.Description: In progress via distance education, expected completion is 2025

Education.List.Institution: Osaka Information and Computer Science College, Osaka, Japan

Contact.Title: Reach Out to Me!
Contact.Content: I'm currently exploring new opportunities in the market for roles such as Software Engineer, Java Developer, or .NET Developer.
If you have a position or project in mind, feel free to reach out. I'll respond promptly to discuss how we can work together.
